text.$invariant:
Automating your roller door makes entering and exiting your home a breeze. However, there’s plenty of benefits beyond convenience. Automating your roller door on your home garage or shed can also make it safer and more secure. 

What sets Automatic Technology roller door openers apart?

contentData.heading: Help protect your family
contentData.description: Automatic Technology roller door openers keep you safe when entering and exiting your home late at night or in the middle of a storm.

contentData.heading: Easy to install
contentData.description: Automation installation made simple and reliable. You can count on Automatic Technology openers to lift and lower your garage door day in and day out for many years to come.

contentData.heading: Prevent unwanted entry
contentData.description: Automatic back drive forces the door back down if it senses an intruder is trying to lift the door.

contentData.heading: In-built smarts
contentData.description: The clever Auto-Reverse feature reverses the door if it senses an obstruction in the way, helping to keep your family and property safe.

contentData.heading: Clever safety reminders
contentData.description: Just like your car, your garage door motor is full of moving parts that require periodic servicing to maintain its performance. Automatic Technology openers give you an audio and visual reminder when they’re ready for a service.

contentData.heading: Stress tested for durability
contentData.description: Soft start and stop technology reduces stress on the opener, which allows the door to open and close both quickly and quietly year after year, not just when it’s installed.
